Donor Agency: City State of Hamburg
Channel of Delivery Name: University, college or other teaching institution, research institute or think-tank
Type of Aid Name: Core support to NGOs, other private bodies, PPPs and research institutes
Short Description: BERNHARD-NOCHT-INSTITUTE FOR TROPICAL MEDICINE (BNITM)
Project title: Bernhard-Nocht-Institute for Tropical Medicine (BNITM)
Long Description: Research, teaching, training and further education as well as consulting and health care in the fields of infectious and tropical medicine. The BNITM ist Germany's largest institution for research, treatment and training in the field of tropical diseases and new emerging infections. As a member of the Leibniz-Association and as a research institute of national importance, the Institute is jointly funded by the Federal Government, the Free and Hanseatic City of Hamburg and the other federal states. Research topics include clinical studies, epidemiology and disease control as well as the biology of pathogens, their reservoirs and vectors. The current scientific focus is on malaria, haemorragic fever viruses, immunology, epidemiology and clinical studies of tropical infections as well as the optimization of control measures against tropical infectious diseases in resource-poor countries and the mechanisms of virus transmission by mosquitoes. For the handling of highly pathogenic viruses and infected insects, the Institute has laboratories of the highest biosafety level (BSL-4) and a BSL-3 insectary. The Institute's health care services include specific laboratory diagnostics of tropical diseases and other rare infections, capacity building as well as the consultation of the scientific community, politics and the general public, which essentially contribute to the Institute's national reputation. The Institute has been appointed by the Federal Ministery of Health as the National Reference Center (NRC) for the detection of all tropical pathogens as well as by the WHO as Collaborating Center for arboviruses and haemorrhagic fever viruses. In collaboration with the Ghanaian Health Ministery and the University of Kumasi the Institute has been operating a modern research and training center in the West-African rain forest for over twentyfive years, which is availableto external research groups. The teaching activities comprise a three months full-time course on all aspects of tropical medicine for physicans as well as a training program for PhD students at the Institute and a number of activities on continuing education in topics related to travel medicine and international health. Numerous scientists of the Institute are involved in student teaching as appointed professors of the University and the University Hospital of Hamburg.

Short Description: DECENTRALIZED MUNICIPAL SERVICES OF GENERAL INTEREST (WASTE), DEVELOPMENT OF THE PUBLIC AND PRIVATE WASTE SECTOR IN MADAGASCAR
Project title: Decentralized municipal services of general interest (waste), development of the public and private waste sector in Madagascar
Long Description: The 2. phase builds on the experience gained in TulTar and ensures that the knowledge continues to be disseminated throughout the country and that the national institutions in the field of waste management and environmental protection are continuously strengthened. In addition, the project will help another city to optimize its current waste management system. Waste management is one of the relevant sectors identified by the Malagasy government to achieve its goal of reducing greenhouse gas emissions. The continuity of the project aims to support in implementing national strategy.

Short Description: STRENGTHENING RESILIENCE IN SCHOOL COMMUNITIES IN MALAWI
Project title: Strengthening resilience in school communities in Malawi
Long Description: Strengthening schools and households through permaculture capacity building of the partners to deliver quality training and monitoring to the schools.

Long Description: Ecological freindly livelihood improvement of rural community in South West Ethiopia

Short Description: ECOLOGICAL FOOD AND AGRICULTURAL RESOURCE MANAGEMENT PROGRAMME
Project title: Ecological Food and Agricultural Resource Management Programme
Long Description: This is an integrated rural development programme which is designed to address the immediate needs of the communities mainly in terms of food security, increasing and diversifying agricultural production, promoting alternative livelihood options and natural resource management with the longer-term aim to foster their self-reliant capacities.

Project title: Livelihood Enhancement for Pastoralist and Agro-pastoralist Dallo Mana, continuation
Long Description: As a consolidation phase, the project is proposed to ensure the sustainability of the previous interventions working towards enhancing the sustainable livelihoods of pastoralist and agro-pastoralist communities in the target district.

Project title: Dara District Integrated Community Capacity Development and Livelihood Improvement Project Phase-III, continuation
Long Description: The main objective of the project is to maintain natural resource harmonised, diversified and sustained means of living for the community project area.

Short Description: CAPACITY DEVELOPMENT AND LIVELIHOODS IMPROVEMENT PROJECT , PHASE I
Project title: Capacity Development and Livelihoods Improvement Project , Phase I
Long Description: The project is proposed to enhance the livelihoods of poor and disadvantaged groups of the target communities in Bulen district, Beneshangul Gumuz Region, Ethopia through enhancing crop and livestock production, diversifying income sources and building the capacity of the community and the primary schools.

Political and economic reforms need to be fostered and put in place to give, especially to the younger genereation, a perspective to stay. Reform minded political decision-makers and economic actors are strengthened with the aim of achieving successful entrepreneurial activity to show young people career development.

The project implements measures to counteract this. This will contribute to improved food security and also to securing livelihoods.

Deficits in food security and agricultural production, a low household income and an increased HIV prevalence rate or risk of infection, combined with inadequate care for the affected persons. The Partner has many years of experience in these fields of activity.

Long Description: Living conditions in the project region are strongly influenced by gold mining, which has an impact in all areas and is often accompanied by conflicts between different interest groups. Project title: Develpment of the sustainability structures of services of general interest (waste) in Sierra Leone
Long Description: Building on the lessons learned in four municipalities Bo, Kenema, Koidu and Makeni, WHH would like to cooperate with the Ministries of Local Government and Rural Development to promote the implementation of legal requirements at national and municipal level. The focus will be put on recycling of plastics and organic waste. Cooperation with investors in the agricultural and mining sector will be important, as together they will be able to absorb a high volume of organic compost. This will allow to reduce the landfilling of organic waste in landfills and will offer income generating measures.

Long Description: The country specific projects contribute to fostering good governance with a particular focus on strengthening a vibrant civil society, rule of law, decentralised administration and conflict preventive sensitisation. This integrative approach emphasises citizen friendly policing, socio-political commitment, improvement of public services and the strength of local economies. (LDC-Part)

Long Description: The country specific projects contribute to fostering good governance with a particular focus on strengthening a vibrant civil society, rule of law, decentralised administration and conflict preventive sensitisation. Short Description: INTRODUCTION OF A DUAL VOCATIONAL TRAINING COURSE FOR BANK SPECIALISTS IN MONGOLIA
Project title: Introduction of a dual vocational training course for bank specialists in Mongolia
Long Description: Strengthening of the banking sector in Mongolia through professionalisation of the bank-specific training and its introduction to international standards. The project objective is the conceptual and contentual development of the dual training course to the bank specialist with a total duration of eight months divided into about 40% theory and 60% practice in the respective departments of the participating banks. Another goal is the introduction of the World Day in Mongolia.

Type of Aid Name: Core support to NGOs, other private bodies, PPPs and research institutes
Short Description: LOCAL INITIATIVES AND AUTHORITIES FOR DEVELOPMENT
Project title: Local Initiatives and authorities for development
Long Description: In order to improve the livelihood of local communities in rural Georgia, the project envisages to strengthen municipal services by connecting local communities and municipal authorities. Both will identify problems, solutions and will implement them together. CIPDD works in 4 different regions with 12 local authorities and in 24 target villages.

Project title: Improving basic sanitation in refugee camps and surrounding communities in Northern Iraq
Long Description: The project at hand promotes the use of gray water from refugee camps for irrigation of vegetable crops of local farmers. Beside the positive environmental, health and economiceffects the project contributes to reduce social conflicts between refugees and host communities by facilitating cooperation between the two groups.

Project title: Consultancy on law and administration and promotion of social, cultural and economic development of Mongolia
Long Description: The aim of the project is to establish the rule of law in Mongolia. Standardisation of the use of administration law by judges and civil servants and capacity building for these actors will contribute. Also, modernisation of mongolian commercial law will allow an increased legal security in its economic sector. Citizens get information and training to claim civil rights and keep civil duties, especially regarding administration. Promotion of national and international exchange (especially with Germany) in the field of legislation provides additional values for mongolian jurisprudence.

Donor Agency: Federal Ministry for Economic Affairs and Energy
Type of Aid Name: Core support to NGOs, other private bodies, PPPs and research institutes
Short Description: SUBSCRIPTION TO THE INTERNATIONAL SEISMOLOGICAL CENTRE 2020
Project title: Subscription to the International Seismological Centre 2020
Long Description: The ISC is to advance scientific knowledge of earthquakes and the structure of the Earth for the public benefit. The principal tasks of the ISC, by which the aforementioned mission is to be achieved, are: To collect instrument readings and derived source parameters from seismological data centres, networks, observatories, or individual scientists throughout the world. To edit, preserve, and distribute the reported data for further analysis. To re-compute source parameters for each considered event, and to make available a bulletin containing original data and derived parameters. To complement the data reported by the agencies worldwide with the data obtained at the ISC by analysing available waveforms. To provide the ISC data openly. To provide other services throughout the world based on data and facilities available within the ISC. To undertake, in cooperation with institutions around the world, such Research & Development as may be relevant to improving the ISC's services.

Project title: Regional Program Cono Sur
Long Description: The regional programme focusses on the support of multiparty democracy, a vibrant civil society, on rule of law and a supportive environment for democracy, social market economy and sustainable development in the Cono Sur countries and in Latin America. Additionally, the programme supports decentralization processes and puts an emphasis on international dialogue about global and regional topics and challenges for Latin America.

Project title: Sustainable social development in the Andean region
Long Description: The Hanns Seidel Foundation contributes to the consolidation of democratic and pluralistic structures in the Andean region (Bolivia, Ecuador and Peru) within State and Society. With partners from the public, private and university sectors, different educational measures for young professionals, political decision-makers and public institutions are implemented both nationally and across countries.

This will be achieved through resultorientedactions related to the climate sensitive DisasterRisk Management complex that will involve all relevantlevels. In this, the development of competences to deal with the effects of climate changeamong pre- identified vulnerable groups is triggered oncommunity level (micro level), improvement of institutionaland personnel capacities of Pakistan Red Crescent (mesolevel)as well as gpvermental bodies.

Project title: Support of democracy, rule of law, Pluralism and market economy in Southheast and East Asia
Long Description: This project helps to strengthen and develop liberal institutions, participative and pluralistic democracy, rule of law with effective mechanisms of human rights protection and market economy in Southeast and East Asia. This is achieved through civic education, political consultancy and political dialogue programmes. Target groups are people in leadership positions, young leaders, and professionals, who act as multipliers in society for achieving sustainable and broad implementation of liberal solutions to economic, political and social issues. Project title: Forest for Life, Continuation
Long Description: The project is on forest conservation and capacity building of tribal members of 7 tribes in Western and Choiseul Provinces of the Solomon Islands. Forest areas of the tribes are certified as legally protected under the Protected Area ACT 2010 while the tribes effectively use new proceeds from these protected forests to improve wellbeing in communities.

Type of Aid Name: Core support to NGOs, other private bodies, PPPs and research institutes
Short Description: POLITICAL DIALOGUE ON PEACE, SECURITY AND MIGRATION IN THE MENA-REGION
Project title: Political Dialogue on Peace, Security and Migration in the MENA-Region
Purpose Name: Civilian peace-building, conflict prevention and resolution
Long Description: FES contributes through its socio-political cooperation, civic education and policy advice by facilitating regional dialogues to peace and security and to the reduction of social injustice which represent the main drivers of displacement, flight and migration within and from the Middle East and North Africa region. Particular emphasis is placed on civic mechanisms for peaceful conflict management as well as on social dialogue as a vehicle for promoting sustainable socio-economic participation.

Purpose Name: Civilian peace-building, conflict prevention and resolution
Long Description: Implementation of democratic principles and institutions, supporting and enforcing rule of law. Development of civil society, strengthening the role of civil society actors. Short Description: STRENGTHENING A MELANESIAN PEACE DIALOGUE AND CONFLICT RESOLUTION NETWORK
Project title: Strengthening a Melanesian Peace Dialogue and Conflict Resolution Network
Purpose Name: Civilian peace-building, conflict prevention and resolution
Long Description: The project provides small grants to six local organisations in Melanesia to support their programmes on conflict resolution, peacebuilding, restorative justice in areas of high conflict potential. It builds capacity of organisations to organise themselves and in project and fund management and facilitates experience exchange and shared learning on approach that work in the local context.

Donor Agency: Bundesministerium fnr Wirtschaftliche Zusammenarbeit und Entwicklung
Type of Aid Name: Core support to NGOs, other private bodies, PPPs and research institutes
Short Description: INTERNATIONAL CLIMATE AND ENVIRONMENT PROTECTION
Project title: International climate and environment protection
Long Description: Representatives from politics, business and civil society, especially in the emerging countries, act based on market economy and regulatory policies for climate-friendly growth and adaptation to climate change. With the help of civic education and policy dialogue, they are aware of climate change and possible solutions. Topics include sustainable mobility and sustainable cities.

Donor Agency: Bundesministerium fnr Wirtschaftliche Zusammenarbeit und Entwicklung
Type of Aid Name: Core support to NGOs, other private bodies, PPPs and research institutes
Short Description: GLOBAL PROGRAMME SPECIAL FUNDS CLIMATE AND ENERGY 6
Project title: Global Programme Special Funds Climate and Energy 6
Long Description: The present proposal has a regional/global orientation and comprises measures to support target groups, particularly in the MENA region, in improving the political and social framework conditions for sustainable development. The focus is on resource security, water supply and climate adaptation and mitigation.

Donor Agency: Bundesministerium fnr Wirtschaftliche Zusammenarbeit und Entwicklung
Type of Aid Name: Core support to NGOs, other private bodies, PPPs and research institutes
Short Description: INTERNATIONAL CLIMATE AND ENVIRONMENT PROTECTION
Project title: International climate and environment protection
Long Description: Representatives from politics, business and civil society, especially in the emerging countries, act based on market economy and regulatory policies for climate-friendly growth and adaptation to climate change. With the help of civic education and policy dialogue, they are aware of climate change and possible solutions. Topics include sustainable mobility and sustainable cities.

Donor Agency: Bundesministerium fnr Wirtschaftliche Zusammenarbeit und Entwicklung
Type of Aid Name: Core support to NGOs, other private bodies, PPPs and research institutes
Short Description: SOCIAL-ECOLOGICAL TRANSFORMATION IN THE MIDDLE EAST AND NORTH AFRICA
Project title: Social-ecological transformation in the Middle East and North Africa
Long Description: The project aims at progressive climate policies and a socially just energy transformation in four countries of the region. It is targeting the implementation of three of the sustainable development goals (7,11,13). Additionally, the project supports regional civil society organisations, which promote the regional climate agenda.

Donor Agency: Bundesministerium fnr Wirtschaftliche Zusammenarbeit und Entwicklung
Type of Aid Name: Core support to NGOs, other private bodies, PPPs and research institutes
Short Description: INTERNATIONAL CLIMATE AND ENVIRONMENTAL PROTECTION KE5
Project title: International Climate and Environmental Protection KE5
Long Description: Against the background of the positive experiences with the regional projects Energy security and Climate Change in Latin America and Asia-Pacific, the present application has also a regional/global focus. An indirect contribution to mitigation and adaptation shall be achieved by enhancing target groups to improve political and social conditions for sustainable development.

Donor Agency: Bundesministerium fnr Wirtschaftliche Zusammenarbeit und Entwicklung
Type of Aid Name: Core support to NGOs, other private bodies, PPPs and research institutes
Short Description: STRENGHTENING PARIS-COMPATIBILITY OF DEVELOPMENT BANKS
Project title: Strenghtening Paris-compatibility of development banks
Long Description: Bi- and multilateral development banks align with the Paris Agreement longtermgoals (Climate mitigation in line with 1.5¦C target, Strengthening of Adaptation, and Shifting of global financial flows) subject to ambitious and comprehensible criteria and havestarted to implement these.

Donor Agency: Bundesministerium fnr Wirtschaftliche Zusammenarbeit und Entwicklung
Type of Aid Name: Core support to NGOs, other private bodies, PPPs and research institutes
Short Description: MULTI- ACTOR-PARTNERSHIP 100% RE FOR ALL
Project title: Multi- Actor-Partnership 100% RE for all
Long Description: Long-term commitment by key stakeholders in four countries to pursue the implementation of '100% RE for all'-Strategy is secured and closely linked with Agenda 2030. Four wellfunctioning Multi-Actor-Partnership (MAP) platforms pursuing the strategies to achieve 100% RE and sustainable development are established and operating after 12 months.

Project title: Support to the socio-political approximation to European Standards in the fieid of democracy and plurailism
Long Description: A sustainable dialogue between officials and activists from politics, science, institutions of justice, the media and civil society on (European) political issues is strengthened in the national, regional and european area. Young and adult people from different regions of Moldova are mature enlightened citizens who play their part in the democratic system

Type of Aid Name: Core support to NGOs, other private bodies, PPPs and research institutes
Short Description: SOCIO-POLITICAL AND TRADE UNION COOPERATION IN SOUTH EAST EUROPE
Project title: Socio-political and trade union cooperation in South East Europe
Long Description: The Friedrich-Ebert-Foundation promotes the establishment and consolidation of the values of social democracy in the societies of South East Europe (only in developing countries) as well as the establishment of a just and sustainable social and economic order that enhances social participation through political cooperation and capacity building. Furthermore, the Friedrich-Ebert-Foundation promotes peacful relationships between the neighboring countries.

Donor Agency: Bundesministerium fnr Wirtschaftliche Zusammenarbeit und Entwicklung
Type of Aid Name: Core support to NGOs, other private bodies, PPPs and research institutes
Short Description: CLIMATE POLICY AS IMPULSE FOR MODERNISATION IN WESTERN BALKAN COUNTRIES AND CLIMATE FINANCE
Project title: Climate policy as impulse for modernisation in Western Balkan countries and climate finance
Long Description: The follow-up project contributes to the acceleration of a socially just transition of climate and energy policy in the Western Balkan countries (focus on Bosnia-Hercegovina and Serbia) and enables civil society monitoring of related EU policy instruments. Washington based activities analyze international climate finance mechanisms and promote their human rights based and gender just design.

Donor Agency: Bundesministerium fnr Wirtschaftliche Zusammenarbeit und Entwicklung
Type of Aid Name: Core support to NGOs, other private bodies, PPPs and research institutes
Short Description: PROMOTION OF DEMOCRACY, RULE OF LAW, PLURALISM AND MARKET ECONOMY IN SOUTHEAST AND EAST EUROPE (ONLY IN DEVELOPING COUNTRIES)
Project title: Promotion of Democracy, Rule of Law, Pluralism and Market Economy in Southeast and East Europe (only in developing countries)
Long Description: Cornerstones of the project work of the regional project for Southeast and East Europe (only in developing countries) of the Foundation for Freedom are the human and civil rights in a functioning constitutional state, the acceptance of pluralistic structures and the protection of the right to property and the promotion of private sector activities in the framework of a market economy. The objective is to move towards open civil societies, which - as formulated by the Development Policy Report of the Federal Government - give people the possibility to live 'a life of freedom, peace and self-reliance'.

Donor Agency: Bundesministerium fnr Wirtschaftliche Zusammenarbeit und Entwicklung

Short Description: INTEGRATED DEVELOPMENT PROGRAMME
Project title: Integrated Development Programme
Long Description: The project focusses on rural and urban development and food sovereignity. The integrated, community based approach includes health, hygiene and combatting FGM as well as alphabetisation, education and employment. The approach is rights-based and participatory, so the beneficiaries themselves determine the development process.

Long Description: The Rule of Law Programme aims at developing the most important elements of the Rule of Law. These are a real separation of powers, respect of constitutions and the principle of legality of public administration, independent judicial structures and the safeguard of basic and human rights. To that end, activities are implemented in Latin America, Africa, the Middle East, Asia and South-eastern Europe (only developing countries).

Long Description: The project is looking to decrease violence against women and discrimination against people with HIV / AIDs in the district of Masaya. This will be achieved by means of the expansion of multipliers networks to independent grassroots organisations, which in the district of Masaya help victims, creating awareness in the population and influence decision-makers.

Long Description: The project advocates for alternative development approaches for the Pacific that are people oriented, self-determined and economically and ecologically sustainable. Long Description: The Regional program aims at the support of democratic political culture, gender-equity, participation of civil society in political processes and ecological modernization of economies in Eastern and South Eastern Europe (only developing countries).

Project title: Regional Program Middle East/North Afrika
Long Description: The programme promotes the political, economic and social development of the Middle East and North Africa and facilitates the dialogue and cooperation between Germany/Europe and the states as well as the societies of the region. Emphasis is put on the advancement of a democratic consciousness and participatory practices, political parties and good governance, support for a free and pluralistic civil society, the promotion of a social and ecological market economy oriented towards sustainability and innovation, the advancement of the Euro-Mediterranean dialogue.

Long Description: Strengthening the resilience of communities in dealing with natural disasters, Tra Vinh und Soc Trang Province, Vientnam, continuation

Donor Agency: Bundesministerium fnr Wirtschaftliche Zusammenarbeit und Entwicklung
Type of Aid Name: Core support to NGOs, other private bodies, PPPs and research institutes
Short Description: SOCIAL JUSTICE AND REGIONAL KOOPERATION IN UKRAINE, IN SOUTH CAUCASUS AND MOLDOVA
Project title: Social Justice and Regional Kooperation in Ukraine, in South Caucasus and Moldova
Long Description: The programme contributes to a peaceful and solidary society, social justice and more regional cooperation. Activities of dialogue and education take place in the Ukraine, Belarus, South Caucasus and Moldova.

Donor Agency: Bundesministerium fnr Wirtschaftliche Zusammenarbeit und Entwicklung
Type of Aid Name: Core support to NGOs, other private bodies, PPPs and research institutes
Short Description: DIGITALISATION OF HEINRICH-BOELL-FOUNDATION INTERNATIONAL OFFICES
Project title: Digitalisation of Heinrich-Boell-Foundation International Offices
Long Description: All international offices will be equipped with standardised IT hard- and software to digitalise their project documentation. Working processes will be adjusted, staff trained and training material developped and provided for.

Donor Agency: Bundesministerium fnr Wirtschaftliche Zusammenarbeit und Entwicklung
Type of Aid Name: Core support to NGOs, other private bodies, PPPs and research institutes
Short Description: REGIONAL PROGRAMME EU (ONLY DEVELOPING COUNTRIES)/NORTH AMERICA - GLOBAL ISSUES AND REGIONAL PERSPECTIVES
Project title: Regional Programme EU (only developing countries)/North America - Global issues and regional perspectives
Long Description: The programme activities aim at critical monitoring of developmental and environmental trends as well as options for their co-managing together with other international and European partners. Another focus of the programme lies on regional perspectives and strengthening developmental cooperation, e.g. through activities in and on Turkey as well as projects in Brussels or Washington that focus on regional Trends in relevant policy fields.

Donor Agency: Bundesministerium fnr Wirtschaftliche Zusammenarbeit und Entwicklung
Type of Aid Name: Core support to NGOs, other private bodies, PPPs and research institutes
Short Description: INTERREGIONAL PROJECT TO PROMOTE DIALOGUE ON ECONOMICS, MIGRATION, HUMAN RIGHTS, THE RULE OF LAW AND SECURITY
Project title: Interregional Project to promote dialogue on economics, migration, human rights, the rule of law and security
Long Description: The project aims to promote liberal and cross-regional cooperation in the area of migration and the elimination of flight causes, thereby adding value both to the political debate in Germany and to the content-related development of existing and new partnerships to combat poverty and flight causes in countries of origin and transit. Its objectives are to connect stakeholders and to develop liberal options for action for countries affected by crises before introducing them to the German or European discourse.

Donor Agency: Bundesministerium fnr Wirtschaftliche Zusammenarbeit und Entwicklung
Channel of Delivery Name: University, college or other teaching institution, research institute or think-tank
Type of Aid Name: Core support to NGOs, other private bodies, PPPs and research institutes
Short Description: INTERNATIONAL CONSERVATION OF CLIMATE AND ENVIRONMENT
Project title: International Conservation of Climate and Environment
Long Description: International Conservation of Climate and Environment

Donor Agency: Bundesministerium fnr Wirtschaftliche Zusammenarbeit und Entwicklung
Type of Aid Name: Core support to NGOs, other private bodies, PPPs and research institutes
Short Description: POLITICAL AND SOCIAL ACTIVITIES IN INSULAR COUNTRIES OF SOUTH-EAST ASIA
Project title: Political and social activities in Insular countries of South-East Asia
Long Description: The programme makes a contribution towards essential global social and ecological changes as well as implementing Global Social Rights, it promotes alternative development concepts and seeks to enlarge spaces for civil society actors in the region.

Donor Agency: Bundesministerium fnr Wirtschaftliche Zusammenarbeit und Entwicklung
Type of Aid Name: Core support to NGOs, other private bodies, PPPs and research institutes
Short Description: INFORMATION AND DIALOGUE PROGRAMME UNITED NATIONS
Project title: Information and Dialogue Programme United Nations
Long Description: The Information and Dialogue Programme has a global approach. The goal is to promote dialogue and networks in the context of the United Nations among central actors of the global south as well as between actors of the global south and north in the field of development politics. The main topics are 'global social rights' and 'socio-ecological transformation'. Instruments are events, publications and other educational material amongst others.

Donor Agency: Bundesministerium fnr Wirtschaftliche Zusammenarbeit und Entwicklung
Type of Aid Name: Core support to NGOs, other private bodies, PPPs and research institutes
Short Description: REGIONAL PROGRAMME MIDDLE EAST AND NORTH AFRICA 2020 - 2022
Project title: Regional Programme Middle East and North Africa 2020 - 2022
Long Description: The regional programme 'Middle East and North Africa aims to empower politicians, decision makers, activists and NGOs in the region, to effectively work on the topics environmental justice, democratisation, gender democracy and conflict management as well as culture and dialogue in their respective context. For this purpose, expert round tables and consultancy meetings, discussion rounds, exhibitions as well as publications and media are used. Furthermore trainings and workshops are taking place.

Donor Agency: Bundesministerium fnr Wirtschaftliche Zusammenarbeit und Entwicklung
Type of Aid Name: Core support to NGOs, other private bodies, PPPs and research institutes
Short Description: MEASURES FOR THE PREPARATION OF PROGRAMMES AND PROJECTS
Project title: Measures for the preparation of programmes and projects
Long Description: Preparatory measures are an essential instrument for the development of possible perspectives and spheres of activities for a future Heinrich-B÷ll-Foundation's engagement in a new region or for a new thematic focus. Expert discussions, workshops or meetings with potential partner organisations and representatives of important public authorities in the region as well as studies and consulting are also part of the programme. In addition, detailed questions can be clarified that arise when setting up a new presence on site or when develop new challenges for foreign offices.

Long Description: Advance the Right to Know (continuation)

Donor Agency: Bundesministerium fnr Wirtschaftliche Zusammenarbeit und Entwicklung
Type of Aid Name: Core support to NGOs, other private bodies, PPPs and research institutes
Short Description: SOCIOPOLITICAL INFORMATION AND TOURS WITH PARTICIPANTS FROM DEVELOPING COUNTRIES+EASTERN + SOUTHEAST EUROPE (ONLY FROM DEVELOPING COUNTRIES) - GERMANY
Project title: Sociopolitical information and tours with participants from developing countries+Eastern + Southeast Europe (only from developing countries) - Germany
Long Description: The visiting programme invites civil social organisations as well as political multipliers to take part in measures, congresses and workshops. The visitors are often requested to give their point of view at political events of the Heinrich-B÷ll-Foundation. The political events support the activities of the regional programmes and cross section programmes Heinrich-B÷ll-Foundation.

Donor Agency: Bundesministerium fnr Wirtschaftliche Zusammenarbeit und Entwicklung
Type of Aid Name: Core support to NGOs, other private bodies, PPPs and research institutes
Short Description: REGIONAL PROGRAMME, CONCENTRATION AMERICA (DEVELOPING COUNTRIES)
Project title: Regional Programme, concentration America (developing countries)
Long Description: The regional programme focusses on the support of multiparty democracy, rule of law, good governance, civic education, a vibrant civil society, ecological, sustainable development and social justice in the Region Northafrica, Caribbean, Mexico, South- and Central America. Furthermore the programme supports regional cooperation of the project countries und multilateral relations with Latin America.

Donor Agency: Bundesministerium fnr Wirtschaftliche Zusammenarbeit und Entwicklung
Type of Aid Name: Core support to NGOs, other private bodies, PPPs and research institutes
Short Description: DEMOCRATIC TRANSITION AND STRUCTURAL CHANGE IN THE MAGHREB
Project title: Democratic transition and structural change in the Maghreb
Long Description: The project aims to strengthen democratic and socio-economic development in the Maghreb.

Donor Agency: Bundesministerium fnr Wirtschaftliche Zusammenarbeit und Entwicklung
Type of Aid Name: Core support to NGOs, other private bodies, PPPs and research institutes
Short Description: SOCIO-POLITICAL CONSULTANCY AND DEVELOPMENT COOPERATION EUROPE
Project title: Socio-political Consultancy and Development Cooperation Europe
Long Description: The projects as agencies of dialogue, education and consultancy participate in the European integration process, address relevant socio-political and socio-economic questions, support the interests of Germany and contribute to shaping the EU's development cooperation and external relations. Emphasis is put on the promotion of democratic participation and the strengthening of civil society. The offices' worldwide network facilitates political, economic, social and environmental dialogue between Germany and Europe, within Europe and also between Europe, the rest of the world and at global scale.

Donor Agency: Bundesministerium fnr Wirtschaftliche Zusammenarbeit und Entwicklung
Type of Aid Name: Core support to NGOs, other private bodies, PPPs and research institutes
Short Description: SHAPING GLOBALIZATION IN A DEMOCRATIC AND SOCIALLY JUST MANNER
Project title: Shaping globalization in a democratic and socially just manner
Long Description: The project enables project partners worldwide in developing countries to engage in the political discourse on globalization. This should enable them to react to the social consequences of globalization. Through consultation processes and cooperation, the project promotes expertise on the interdependencies and options for political creativity.

Donor Agency: Bundesministerium fnr Wirtschaftliche Zusammenarbeit und Entwicklung
Type of Aid Name: Core support to NGOs, other private bodies, PPPs and research institutes
Short Description: FORMATION OF DEMOCRATIC, SOLIDARY AND GENDER-EQUAL SOCIETIES IN WEST ASIA (LDC-PART)
Project title: Formation of democratic, solidary and gender-equal societies in West Asia (LDC-Part)
Long Description: The program contributes to the formation of democratic, solidary and gender-equal societies e.p. in Yemen by supporting progressive civil society organizations in the implementation of their activities, approaches, and demands.

Donor Agency: Bundesministerium fnr Wirtschaftliche Zusammenarbeit und Entwicklung
Type of Aid Name: Core support to NGOs, other private bodies, PPPs and research institutes
Short Description: PROMOTING DEMOCRACY, CIVIL SOCIETY AND MARKET ECONOMY IN NORTHERN AFRICA AND MIDDLE EAST
Project title: Promoting democracy, civil society and market economy in Northern Africa and Middle East
Long Description: Corner stones of the project work of the regional project for Middle East and North Africa of the Foundation for Freedom are the human and civil rights in a functioning constitutional state, the acceptance of pluralistic structures and the protection of the right to property and the promotion of private sector activities in the framework of a market economy. The objective is to move towards open civil societies which û as formulated by the Development Policy Report of the Federal Government of Germany û give people the possibility to live a life of freedom, peace and self-reliance

Short Description: CIVIL PEACE SERVICE (CPS)
Project title: Civil Peace Service (CPS)
Purpose Name: Civilian peace-building, conflict prevention and resolution
Long Description: The Civil Peace Service (CPS) is a joint programme of governmental and non-governmental agencies. It supports projects aimed at non-violent conflict resolutions in various countries worldwide. By seconding experts, local partner organisations are assisted in the prevention of violent conflicts and crisis, reduction of violence and by securing long-term peace.

Purpose Name: Facilitation of orderly, safe, regular and responsible migration and mobili
Long Description: The aim of membership is to intensify the transatlantic dialogue, to bring integration policy approaches by the Federal Ministry of the Interior, for Building and Home (BMI) into the 'Transatlantic Council on Migration (TCM)' and to gain new impulses for German integration policy. In addition to participating in the meetings, membership includes access to the expertise of the 'Migration Policy Institute (MPI)', the preparation of expert reports on current key issues and support for events and conferences.

Type of Aid Name: Core support to NGOs, other private bodies, PPPs and research institutes
Short Description: HUMAN RIGHTS PROTECTION AND SUPPORT OF THE SOCIO-ECONOMIC EMPOWERMENT OF WOMEN/GIRLS IN TIRANA, ESPECIALLY OF THOSE AFFECTED BY DOMESTIC VIOLENCE
Project title: Human rights protection and support of the socio-economic empowerment of women/girls in Tirana, especially of those affected by domestic violence
Purpose Name: Women's rights organisations and movements, and government institutions
Long Description: The project contributes to better protection of the Human Rights in Albania. Relevant public institutions like police offices, social offices and health offices will be trained to implement correct the relevant law related to the protection of Human Rights. In the same time also affected people will be empowered and supported to claim their rights and to change their situation.

Donor Agency: Bundesministerium fnr Wirtschaftliche Zusammenarbeit und Entwicklung
Type of Aid Name: Core support to NGOs, other private bodies, PPPs and research institutes
Short Description: TURKEY AND MIGRATION - SUPPORT FOR SELECTED TURKISH MUNICIPATIES/MUNICIPAL QUARTERS AFFECTED BY INTERNAL AND EXTERNAL MIGRATION
Project title: Turkey and Migration - Support for selected Turkish municipaties/municipal quarters affected by internal and external migration
Long Description: Selected Turkish pilot municipalities/pilot municipal quarters are supported to face more professionally the problems of internal and external migration. Their management capacity will be increased. Involved state institutions like vocational training centers and national centers for civic education will be promoted. Volunteer platforms for the support of internal and external migrants will be strengthened.
